name: Verify that Get all Posts endpoint returns all the existent posts
description: As I user, I want to get all posts published on GoRest API

steps.name: When I call the "posts" endpoint using "GET" option
Then I receive the response and validate with "Get_all_posts" file
And I validate the status code is 200

fullName: Posts: Verify that Get all Posts endpoint returns all the existent posts
